rukus.text: 89|1|Sapatha phajarera [1]
89|2|sapatha dasa ratera [1]
89|3|sapatha jora o bejorera [1]
89|4|sapatha ratera yakhana ta gata haye thake –[1]—
89|5|niscaya'i era madhye sapatha rayeche bodhasampanna byaktira jan'ya [1].
89|6|Apani dekhenani apanara raba ki (acarana) karechilena ‘ada bansera
89|7|irama gotrera prati [1]--- yara adhikari chila su'ucca prasadera
89|8|yara samatulya kono dese srsti kara hayani [1]
89|9|Ebam samudera prati?- Yara upatyakaya [1] pathara kete ghara nirmana karechila
89|10|ebam kilaka'oyala phira‘a'unera prati [1]
89|11|yara dese simalanghana karechila
89|12|atahpara sekhane asanti brd'dhi karechila.
89|13|Phale apanara raba tadera upara sastira kasaghata hanalena.
89|14|Niscaya apanara raba satarka drsti rakhena [1].
89|15|Manusa to erupa ye, tara raba yakhana take pariksa karena sam'mana o anugraha dana kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake sam'manita karechena [1].’
89|16|Ara yakhana take pariksa karena tara riyka sankucita kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake hina karechena.’
89|17|Kakhano naya [1]. Baram [2] tomara iyatimake sam'mana kara na
89|18|ebam tomara misakinake khadyadane parasparake utsahita kara na [1]
89|19|ara tomara uttaradhikarera sampada sampurnarupe kheye phela [1]
89|20|ara tomara dhana-sampada khuba'i bhalabasa [1]
89|21|kakhano naya [1]. Yakhana yaminake curna- bicurna kara habe [2]
89|22|ara yakhana apanara raba agamana karabena o saribad'dhabhabe pherestagana'o [1]
89|23|ara sedina jahannamake ana habe [1], sedina manusa smarana karabe, takhana e smarana tara ki kaje asabe [2]
89|24|se balabe, ‘haya! Amara e jibanera jan'ya ami yadi kichu agrima pathatama?”
89|25|Sedina tamra sastira mata sasti ke'u dite parabe na
89|26|ebam tamra bamdhara mata bamdhate ke'u parabe na.
89|27|He prasanta atma
89|28|tumi tomara rabera kache phire asa santusta o santosabhajana haye [1]
89|29|atahpara amara bandadera antarbhukta ha'o [1]
89|30|ara amara jannate prabesa kara.
